ComicInfo.Summary:
3-D Disaster Doom Death!: An aging actor makes a deal with the Devil to perform one last great scene.
A Simple Wish: A Monster crawls out of a volcano to live with humans. He is mis-understood by everyone except the old blind guy in the woods.
The Night People: A crook in a department store is attacked by the manikins.
The Will to Kill: John is talked into killing his boss by his fiance so he can get the boss's job.
Triple-Header!: Mike Perry kills his wife and her lover in the jungle. They all end up as shrunken heads.
